title: Paris-Roubaix: Records, Crashes, Yellow Cards, Hors-Délai, Fines for Van der Poel
content:
Tour de Hoody: Paris-Roubaix weekend saw records fall, yellow cards doled out, fines imposed, brutal crashes, flying highs, and riders missing time cuts.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix: Records, Crashes, Yellow Cards, Hors-Délai, Fines for Van der Poel on Velo.
author: ahood
